overview:
Tron Black is a serial entrepreneur.

Founder of InfoPerfect. - Productivity tools for your PC. Automate tasks with macros, scheduling and more.

Founder of RegNet - A software / shareware registration site. Acquired by Digital River.

Founder of Blue Squirrel - Productivity tools for the Internet. Search, download and print anything. Acquired by The Forefront Group.

Currently founder of Qvro.com - An online site for vacation rental owners/managers to increase their rentals and profits with online booking, and marketing tools for getting the most out of unbooked nights.
